column6: 在us-east-1中实例化c3.8xlarge实例。配置AWS Storage Gateway并将其配置为3 TB存储和100,000 lOPS。将卷附加到实例。
column7: 在us-east-la中实例化i2.8xlarge实例。使用随实例提供的四个800GB SSD临时磁盘创建RAID 0卷。在us-east-lb中为同一配置的实例配置同步，块级复制。

column2: 您需要为VPC设置安全性，并且您知道Amazon VPC提供了两个可用于提高VPC安全性的功能：安全组和网络访问控制列表（ACL）。您首先开始研究安全组。以下哪个声明与安全组有关？
column3: 是有状态的：无论有什么规则，都会自动允许返回流量。
column4: 在决定是否允许流量之前评估所有规则。
column5: 支持允许规则和拒绝规则。
column6: 在实例级别操作（第一层防御）。
column15: Amazon VPC provides two features that you can use to increase security for your VPC: Security groups--Act as a firewall for associated Amazon EC2 instances, controlling both inbound and outbound traffic at the instance level and supports allow rules only. Network access control lists (ACLs)--Act as a firewall for associated subnets, controlling both inbound and outbound traffic at the subnet level and supports allow rules and deny rules. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_Security.html

column2: 您正在设置一些IAM用户策略，并且还意识到某些服务支持基于资源的权限，这使您可以将策略附加到服务的资源而不是IAM用户或组。关于资源级权限，以下哪些陈述是正确的？
column3: 所有服务都支持所有操作的资源级权限。
column5: 所有服务仅支持某些操作的资源级权限。
column6: 某些服务仅支持某些操作的资源级权限。
column15: AWS Identity and Access Management is a web service that enables Amazon Web Services (AWS) customers to manage users and user permissions in AWS. The service is targeted at organizations with multiple users or systems that use AWS products such as Amazon EC2, Amazon RDS, and the AWS Management Console. With IAM, you can centrally manage users, security credentials such as access keys, and permissions that control which AWS resources users can access. In addition to supporting IAM user policies, some services support resource-based permissions, which let you attach policies to the service's resources instead of to IAM users or groups. Resource-based permissions are supported by Amazon S3, Amazon SNS, and Amazon SQS. The resource-level permissions service supports IAM policies in which you can specify individual resources using Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the policy's Resource element. Some services support resource-level permissions only for some actions. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_SpecificProducts.html

column2: 用户希望提高EBS卷的耐用性和可用性。他应该执行以下哪项行动？
column5: 创建具有更高容量的EBS。
column6: 定期访问EBS。
column15: In Amazon Web Services, Amazon EBS volumes that operate with 20 GB or less of modified data since their most recent snapshot can expect an annual failure rate (AFR) between 0.1% and 0.5%. For this reason, to maximize both durability and availability of their Amazon EBS data, the user should frequently create snapshots of the Amazon EBS volumes. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Storage_Options.pdf

column15: If your application is running on Amazon EC2 instances in two or more Amazon EC2 regions, and if you have more than one Amazon EC2 instance in one or more regions, you can use latency-based routing to route traffic to the correct region and then use weighted resource record sets to route traffic to instances within the region based on weights that you specify. For example, suppose you have three Amazon EC2 instances with Elastic IP addresses in the US East (Virginia) region and you want to distribute requests across all three IPs evenly for users for whom US East (Virginia) is the appropriate region. Just one Amazon EC2 instance is sufficient in the other regions, although you can apply the same technique to many regions at once. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/DeveloperGuide/Tutorials.html

column2: 与AWS交互的任何人或应用程序都需要安全凭证。 AWS使用这些凭据来识别正在进行呼叫的人员以及是否允许所请求的访问权限。您刚刚为客户端设置了VPC网络，现在您正在考虑保护此网络的最佳方法。您设置了一个名为vpcsecuritygroup的安全组。如果您选择使用此组的默认设置，那么对于将应用于此安全组的初始设置，以下哪条陈述是正确的？

column4: 不允许入站流量并允许所有出站流量。
column5: 仅允许端口80上的入站流量并允许所有出站流量。
column6: 允许所有入站流量并允许所有出站流量。
column15: Amazon VPC provides advanced security features such as security groups and network access control lists to enable inbound and outbound filtering at the instance level and subnet level. AWS assigns each security group a unique ID in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. The following are the initial settings for a security group that you create: Allow no inbound traffic Allow all outbound traffic Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-network-security.html

column2: 您使用Amazon SES作为电子邮件解决方案，但不确定其局限性。以下哪个陈述是正确的？
column3: 已获得生产访问权限的新亚马逊SES用户每24小时可发送多达1,000封电子邮件，最高速率为每秒10封电子邮件。
column4: 每个Amazon SES发件人都有一组相同的发送限制
column5: 发送限制基于邮件而不是收件人
column6: 每个Amazon SES发件人都有一组独特的发送限制
column15: Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES) is a highly scalable and cost-effective email-sending service for businesses and developers. Amazon SES eliminates the complexity and expense of building an in-house email solution or licensing, installing, and operating a third-party email service for this type of email communication. Every Amazon SES sender has a unique set of sending limits, which are calculated by Amazon SES on an ongoing basis: Sending quota -- the maximum number of emails you can send in a 24-hour period. Maximum send rate -- the maximum number of emails you can send per second. New Amazon SES users who have received production access can send up to 10,000 emails per 24-hour period, at a maximum rate of 5 emails per second. Amazon SES automatically adjusts these limits upward, as long as you send high-quality email. If your existing quota is not adequate for your needs and the system has not automatically increased your quota, you can submit an SES Sending Quota Increase case at any time. Sending limits are based on recipients rather than on messages. You can check your sending limits at any time by using the Amazon SES console. Note that if your email is detected to be of poor or questionable quality (e.g., high complaint rates, high bounce rates, spam, or abusive content), Amazon SES might temporarily or permanently reduce your permitted send volume, or take other action as AWS deems appropriate. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/ses/faqs/

column2: 刚刚建立了第一个定义了默认网络接口的亚马逊虚拟私有云（Amazon VPC）网络，您决定需要创建并附加一个额外的网络接口，称为弹性网络接口（ENI）。实例。关于将网络接口连接到VPC中的实例，以下哪项是正确的？
column3: 每个实例类型可以附加5个ENI。
column4: 您可以根据需要附加任意数量的ENI。
column5: 您可以附加的ENI数量因实例类型而异。
column6: 无论实例类型如何，您都可以附加100个ENI。
column15: Each instance in your VPC has a default network interface that is assigned a private IP address from the IP address range of your VPC. You can create and attach an additional network interface, known as an elastic network interface (ENI), to any instance in your VPC. The number of ENIs you can attach varies by instance type.

column2: VPC的_____是您可能要为后端RDS数据库实例指定的子网集合（通常是私有的）。
column5: 数据库子网组
column6: 数据库子网集合
column15: DB Subnet Groups are a set of subnets (one per Availability Zone of a particular region) designed for your DB instances that reside in a VPC. They make easy to manage Multi-AZ deployments as well as the conversion from a Single-AZ to a Mutli-AZ one. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Overview.RDSVPC.html

column2: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing用于管理一组Amazon EC2实例上的流量，将流量分配到区域内所有可用区域的实例。 Elastic Load Balancing具有本地负载均衡器的所有优点，并具有多种安全优势。以下哪项不是ELB优于内部部署负载均衡器的优势？
column3: ELB使用基于密钥的四层架构进行加密。
column4: ELB为客户提供单点联系，也可以作为抵御网络攻击的第一道防线。
column5: ELB从Amazon EC2实例接管加密和解密工作，并在负载均衡器上集中管理它。
column6: ELB支持在使用安全HTTP（HTTPS）连接的网络上使用TLS（以前为SSL）进行端到端流量加密。
column15: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing is used to manage traffic on a fleet of Amazon EC2 instances, distributing traffic to instances across all availability zones within a region. Elastic Load Balancing has all the advantages of an on- premises load balancer, plus several security benefits: Takes over the encryption and decryption work from the Amazon EC2 instances and manages it centrally on the load balancer Offers clients a single point of contact, and can also serve as the first line of defense against attacks on your network When used in an Amazon VPC, supports creation and management of security groups associated with your Elastic Load Balancing to provide additional networking and security options Supports end-to-end traffic encryption using TLS (previously SSL) on those networks that use secure HTTP (HTTPS) connections. When TLS is used, the TLS server certificate used to terminate client connections can be managed centrally on the load balancer, rather than on every individual instance. Reference: http://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/Security/AWS%20Security%20Whitepaper.pdf

column2: 您已经设置了一个包含大量图像的S3存储桶，并且您已决定希望任何人能够访问这些图像，甚至是匿名用户。要完成此任务，请创建存储桶策略。您将需要使用在主要元素中指定__________的Amazon S3存储桶策略，这意味着任何人都可以访问存储桶。
column5: 通配符（*）
column6: S3用户
column15: You can use the AWS Policy Generator to create a bucket policy for your Amazon S3 bucket. You can then use the generated document to set your bucket policy by using the Amazon S3 console, by a number of third-party tools, or via your application. You use an Amazon S3 bucket policy that specifies a wildcard (*) in the principal element, which means anyone can access the bucket. With anonymous access, anyone (including users without an AWS account) will be able to access the bucket. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/iam-troubleshooting.html#d0e20565

column2: 您被要求为本地应用程序构建用于灾难恢复的AWS基础架构，并且您应该使用AWS Storage Gateway作为解决方案的一部分。以下哪项最能说明AWS Storage Gateway的功能？
column3: 加速在AWS云和便携式存储设备之间传输大量数据。
column4: 一种Web服务，可加速静态和动态Web内容的分发。
column5: 将本地软件设备与基于云的存储连接，以在您的本地IT环境和AWS的存储基础架构之间提供无缝，安全的集成。
column6: 是否针对不常使用的数据或“冷数据”优化了存储服务。
column15: AWS Storage Gateway connects an on-premises software appliance with cloud-based storage to provide seamless integration with data security features between your on-premises IT environment and the Amazon Web Services (AWS) storage infrastructure. You can use the service to store data in the AWS cloud for scalable and cost-effective storage that helps maintain data security. AWS Storage Gateway offers both volume-based and tape-based storage solutions: Volume gateways Gateway-cached volumes Gateway-stored volumes Gateway-virtual tape library (VTL) Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/architecturecenter/AWS_ac_ra_disasterrecovery_07.pdf

column2: 组织有法定要求保护S3对象的静态数据。组织无需启用以下哪些选项来实现数据安全性？
column5: 铲斗版本
column6: 数据复制
column15: AWS S3 provides multiple options to achieve the protection of data at REST. The options include Permission (Policy), Encryption (Client and Server Side), Bucket Versioning and MFA based delete. The user can enable any of these options to achieve data protection. Data replication is an internal facility by AWS where S3 replicates each object across all the Availability Zones and the organization need not enable it in this case. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Security_Best_Practices.pdf

column2: 在Amazon CloudFront中，如果您使用Amazon EC2实例和其他自定义来源与CloudFront，建议_____。

column5: 为CloudWatch指标启用访问密钥轮换

column15: In Amazon CloudFront, you should use an Elastic Load Balancing load balancer to handle traffic across multiple Amazon EC2 instances and to isolate your application from changes to Amazon EC2 instances. When you create your CloudFront distribution, specify the URL of the load balancer for the domain name of your origin server. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/ CustomOriginBestPractices.html

column2: 在Amazon EC2实例上启用详细监控时，将度量标准数据发送到CloudWatch的时间段是多少？
column5: 1分钟
column15: By default, Amazon EC2 metric data is automatically sent to CloudWatch in 5-minute periods. However, you can, enable detailed monitoring on an Amazon EC2 instance, which sends data to CloudWatch in 1-minute periods Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-cloudwatch.html

column2: 政府客户需要您为一些极端机密的数据设置安全的加密密钥存储。您确定AWS CloudHSM是最佳服务。但是，在此之前似乎有一些先决条件，其中一个是具有某些端口打开的安全组。对于这些安全组，以下哪项是正确的？
column3: 具有端口22（用于SSH）或端口3389（用于RDP）的安全组对您的网络开放。
column4: 没有端口打开网络的安全组。
column5: 仅对端口3389（对于RDP）打开网络的安全组。
column6: 只有端口22（用于SSH）的安全组对您的网络开放。
column15: AWS CloudHSM provides secure cryptographic key storage to customers by making hardware security modules (HSMs) available in the AWS cloud. AWS CloudHSM requires the following environment before an HSM appliance can be provisioned. A virtual private cloud (VPC) in the region where you want the AWS CloudHSM service. One private subnet (a subnet with no Internet gateway) in the VPC. The HSM appliance is provisioned into this subnet. One public subnet (a subnet with an Internet gateway attached). The control instances are attached to this subnet. An AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that delegates access to your AWS resources to AWS CloudHSM. An EC2 instance, in the same VPC as the HSM appliance, that has the SafeNet client software installed. This instance is referred to as the control instance and is used to connect to and manage the HSM appliance. A security group that has port 22 (for SSH) or port 3389 (for RDP) open to your network. This security group is attached to your control instances so you can access them remotely.

column15: In addition to supporting IAM user policies, some services support resource-based permissions, which let you attach policies to the service's resources instead of to IAM users or groups. Resource-based permissions are supported by Amazon S3, Amazon SNS, Amazon SQS, Amazon Glacier and Amazon EBS. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_SpecificProducts.html

column2: 内容和媒体服务器是您需要为客户端满足的最新要求。客户对其要求非常具体，例如低延迟，高可用性，耐用性和访问控制。此服务器上可能会有数百万次观看，并且由于“尖锐”的使用模式，运营团队需要配置静态硬件，网络和管理资源以支持最大的预期需求。客户群初期较低，但预计会增长并在地理上分布更广。以下哪项是内容分发的好解决方案？

Amazon S3 and Amazon CloudFront can be configured by a web service, the AWS Management Console, or a host of third-party management tools. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/architecturecenter/AWS_ac_ra_media_02.pdf

column2: 您正在设置第一个Amazon Virtual Private Cloud（Amazon VPC）网络，因此您决定应该使用AWS管理控制台和VPC向导。在AWS管理控制台上的Amazon VPC页面中启动“启动VPC向导”后，以下哪项不适用于网络架构？
column3: 仅具有单个公共子网的VPC
column4: 仅具有公共子网和硬件VPN访问的VPC
column5: 具有公共和私有子网以及硬件VPN访问的VPC
column6: 仅具有私有子网和硬件VPN访问的VPC
column15: Amazon VPC enables you to build a virtual network in the AWS cloud - no VPNs, hardware, or physical datacenters required. Your AWS resources are automatically provisioned in a ready-to-use default VPC. You can choose to create additional VPCs by going to Amazon VPC page on the AWS Management Console and click on the "Start VPC Wizard" button. You'll be presented with four basic options for network architectures. After selecting an option, you can modify the size and IP address range of the VPC and its subnets. If you select an option with Hardware VPN Access, you will need to specify the IP address of the VPN hardware on your network. You can modify the VPC to add more subnets or add or remove gateways at any time after the VPC has been created. The four options are: VPC with a Single Public Subnet Only VPC with Public and Private Subnets VPC with Public and Private Subnets and Hardware VPN Access VPC with a Private Subnet Only and Hardware VPN Access Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/vpc/faqs/

column2: EC2实例连接到一个子网中的ENI（弹性网络接口）。将不同子网的ENI连接到此EC2实例时会发生什么？
column3: EC2实例遵循旧子网的规则
column4: EC2实例遵循两个子网的规则
column5: 不可能，不能连接到2个ENI
column6: EC2实例遵循较新子网的规则
column15: AWS allows you create an elastic network interface (ENI), attach an ENI to an EC2 instance, detach an ENI from an EC2 instance and attach this ENI to another EC2 instance. The attributes of a network traffic follow the ENI which is attached to an EC2 instance or detached from an EC2 instance. When you move an ENI from one EC2 instance to another, network traffic is redirected to the new EC2 instance. You can create and attach additional ENIs to an EC2 instance. Attaching multiple network interfaces (ENIs) to an EC2 instance is useful to: Create a management network. Use network and security appliances in your VPC. Create dual-homed instances with workloads/roles on distinct subnets Create a low-budget, high-availability solution. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-eni.html

CloudFront delivers your content using a global network of edge locations and works seamlessly with Amazon S3 which durably stores the original and definitive versions of your files. Amazon CloudFront billing is maily affected by Data Transfer Out Edge Location Traffic Distribution Requests Dedicated IP SSL Certificates Reference: http://calculator.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html

Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/launching-instance.html

column2: 您的公司有多个IT部门，每个部门都有自己的VPC。某些VPC位于同一AWS账户内，而其他VPC位于不同的AWS账户中。您希望将所有VPC对等在一起，以使IT部门能够完全访问彼此的资源。 VPC对等有一些限制。以下哪些陈述与VPC对等关系不正确？
column3: 无法在对等VPC中的实例之间解析私有DNS值。
column4: 您可以在同一个两个VPC之间最多连接3个VPC对等连接。
column5: 您无法在不同区域的VPC之间创建VPC对等连接。
column6: 您对每个VPC可以拥有的活动和挂起VPC对等连接数有限制。
column15: same time. The Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) across a VPC peering connection is 1500 bytes. A placement group can span peered VPCs; however, you will not get full-bisection bandwidth between instances in peered VPCs. Unicast reverse path forwarding in VPC peering connections is not supported. You cannot reference a security group from the peer VPC as a source or destination for ingress or egress rules in your security group. Instead, reference CIDR blocks of the peer VPC as the source or destination of your security group's ingress or egress rules. Private DNS values cannot be resolved between instances in peered VPCs. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/PeeringGuide/vpc-peering-overview.html#vpc- peering-li mitations

column2: 公司希望审查Glacier的安全要求。以下哪项陈述适用于AWS Glacier数据安全性？
column3: 存储在Glacier上的所有数据都受AES-256服务器端加密保护。
column4: 存储在Glacier上的所有数据均受AES-128服务器端加密保护。
column5: 用户可以设置服务器端加密标志以加密存储在Glacier上的数据。
column6: 存储在Glacier上的数据默认不加密。
column15: For Amazon Web Services, all the data stored on Amazon Glacier is protected using serverside encryption. AWS generates separate unique encryption keys for each Amazon Glacier archive, and encrypts it using AES-256. The encryption key then encrypts itself using AES-256 with a master key that is stored in a secure location. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Security_Best_Practices.pdf

column2: 您正在构建一个高度可扩展且可靠的Web应用程序，该应用程序将包含大量内容。您已决定使用Cloudfront，因为它将加速您的静态和动态Web内容的分发，并了解Amazon CloudFront与Amazon CloudWatch集成指标，以便您可以监控您的Web应用程序。因为您居住在悉尼，所以您在AWS控制台中选择了亚太地区（悉尼）。但是，您已设置此项，但CloudWatch控制台中似乎没有出现CloudFront指标。以下可能选择的最可能原因是什么？
column3: 仅当您选择与要监控的应用程序相同的区域时，CloudWatch的度量标准才可用。
column4: 您需要为CloudWatch付费才能使其变为活动状态。
column5: 仅当您选择美国东部（弗吉尼亚北部）时，CloudWatch的指标才可用
column6: CloudWatch的指标尚未面向亚太地区。
column15: CloudFront is a global service, and metrics are available only when you choose the US East (N. Virginia) region in the AWS console. If you choose another region, no CloudFront metrics will appear in the CloudWatch console. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/monitoring-using- cloudwatch.html

column2: 朋友希望您在Amazon S3上为他设置一个小型BitTorrent存储区域。你告诉他，AWS不太可能在他们的基础设施中允许这样的事情。但是你决定调查。以下哪项陈述最能说明使用BitTorrent和Amazon S3？
column3: Amazon S3不支持BitTorrent协议，因为它用于盗版软件。
column4: 您可以使用BitTorrent协议，但仅适用于小于100 GB的对象。
column5: 您可以使用BitTorrent协议，但您需要首先向AWS询问特定权限。
column6: 您可以使用BitTorrent协议，但仅适用于小于5 GB的对象。
column15: BitTorrent is an open, peer-to-peer protocol for distributing files. You can use the BitTorrent protocol to retrieve any publicly-accessible object in Amazon S3. Amazon S3 supports the BitTorrent protocol so that developers can save costs when distributing content at high scale. Amazon S3 is useful for simple, reliable storage of any data. The default distribution mechanism for Amazon S3 data is via client/server download. In client/server distribution, the entire object is transferred point-to- point from Amazon S3 to every authorized user who requests that object. While client/server delivery is appropriate for a wide variety of use cases, it is not optimal for everybody. Specifically, the costs of client/server distribution increase linearly as the number of users downloading objects increases. This can make it expensive to distribute popular objects. BitTorrent addresses this problem by recruiting the very clients that are downloading the object as distributors themselves: Each client downloads some pieces of the object from Amazon S3 and some from other clients, while simultaneously uploading pieces of the same object to other interested "peers." The benefit for publishers is that for large, popular files the amount of data actually supplied by Amazon S3 can be substantially lower than what it would have been serving the same clients via client/server download. Less data transferred means lower costs for the publisher of the object. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/S3Torrent.html

column2: 在发生重大安全漏洞后，您的经理要求在AWS中报告所有用户及其凭据。您发现在IAM中，您可以生成并下载凭据报告，该报告列出了您帐户中的所有用户及其各种凭据的状态，包括密码，访问密钥，MFA设备和签名证书。关于使用凭证报告，以下哪个陈述不正确？
column3: 凭据报告是下载的XML文件。
column4: 您可以使用AWS管理控制台，AWS CLI或IAM API获取凭据报告。
column5: 您可以使用该报告来审核凭据生命周期要求的影响，例如密码轮换。
column6: 您可以每四个小时生成一次凭据报告。
column15: To access your AWS account resources, users must have credentials. You can generate and download a credential report that lists all users in your account and the status of their various credentials, including passwords, access keys, MFA devices, and signing certificates. You can get a credential report using the AWS Management Console, the AWS CLI, or the IAM API. You can use credential reports to assist in your auditing and compliance efforts. You can use the report to audit the effects of credential lifecycle requirements, such as password rotation. You can provide the report to an external auditor, or grant permissions to an auditor so that he or she can download the report directly. You can generate a credential report as often as once every four hours. When you request a report, IAM first checks whether a report for the account has been generated within the past four hours. If so, the most recent report is downloaded. If the most recent report for the account is more than four hours old, or if there are no previous reports for the account, IAM generates and downloads a new report. Credential reports are downloaded as comma-separated values (CSV) files. You can open CSV files with common spreadsheet software to perform analysis, or you can build an application that consumes the CSV files programmatically and performs custom analysis. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/credential-reports.html

column2: 在最近的公司会议中，您的CEO专注于组织中的每个人都需要确保构建的所有基础架构都具有真正可扩展性这一事实。在参考可扩展架构时，以下哪些陈述不正确？
column3: 可扩展服务能够处理异构性。
column4: 可扩展的服务具有弹性。
column5: 可扩展的架构随着其发展而不具有成本效益。
column6: 资源的增加导致绩效按比例增加。
column15: In AWS it is critical to build a scalable architecture in order to take advantage of a scalable infrastructure. The cloud is designed to provide conceptually infinite scalability. However, you cannot leverage all that scalability in infrastructure if your architecture is not scalable. Both have to work together. You will have to identify the monolithic components and bottlenecks in your architecture, identify the areas where you cannot leverage the on- demand provisioning capabilities in your architecture, and work to refactor your application, in order to leverage the scalable infrastructure and take advantage of the cloud. Characteristics of a truly scalable application: Increasing resources results in a proportional increase in performance A scalable service is capable of handling heterogeneity A scalable service is operationally efficient A scalable service is resilient A scalable service should become more cost effective when it grows (Cost per unit reduces as the number of units increases) Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Cloud_Best_Practices.pdf

column2: 用户已定义AutoScaling终止策略，以首先删除具有最近计费小时的实例。 AutoScaling在US-East-1A地区推出了3个实例，在US-East-1B地区推出了2个实例。美国东部-B1区域中的一个实例最接近计费时间。在执行终止操作时，AutoScaling将首先终止哪个实例？

column15: Even though the user has configured the termination policy, before AutoScaling selects an instance to terminate, it first identifies the Availability Zone that has more instances than the other Availability Zones used by the group. Within the selected Availability Zone, it identifies the instance that matches the specified termination policy. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AutoScaling/latest/DeveloperGuide/us-termination-policy.html

If the user wants to allow traffic only from ELB, he should remove all the rules set for the other requests and open the port only for the ELB source security group. The elastic IP helps the user achieve HA when one of the instances is down but still keeps the same URL. The AMI helps launching the new instance. The PIOPS is for the performance of EBS and does not help for HA. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Web_Hosting_Best_Practices.pdf

column6: 您需要为其运行时的堆栈资源付费（但如果您在30分钟内删除了堆栈则不会）
column15: A stack is a collection of AWS resources that you can manage as a single unit. In other words, you can create, update, or delete a collection of resources by creating, updating, or deleting stacks. All the resources in a stack are defined by the stack's AWS CloudFormation template. A stack, for instance, can include all the resources required to run a web application, such as a web server, a database, and networking rules. If you no longer require that web application, you can simply delete the stack, and all of its related resources are deleted. You are charged for the stack resources for the time they were operating (even if you deleted the stack right away). Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/stacks.html

Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Storage_Options.pdf

column2: 在AWS上为客户端部署新网站后，他询问您是否可以对其进行设置，以便在失败时将其自动重定向到他在其他地方存储在专用服务器上的备份网站。您想知道Amazon Route 53是否可以执行此操作。关于亚马逊Route 53，下面哪个陈述是正确的？

column15: With DNS Failover, Amazon Route 53 can help detect an outage of your website and redirect your end users to alternate locations where your application is operating properly. Reference: http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2013/02/11/announcing-dns-failover-for-route-53/

column15: When dealing with security groups, bear in mind that you can freely add and remove rules from a group, but you can't change the outbound rules for EC2-Classic. If you're using the Amazon EC2 console, you can modify existing rules, and you can copy the rules from an existing security group to a new security group. Reference: http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-network-security.html

column2: 一家网页设计公司目前运行多个FTP服务器，其250名客户用于上传和下载大型图形文件。他们希望将此系统移至AWS以使其更具可扩展性，但他们希望保持客户隐私并将成本降至最低。您会推荐什么AWS架构？
column3: 要求他们的客户使用53客户端而不是FTP客户端。创建单个53存储桶为每个客户创建一个lAM用户将lAM用户置于具有lAM策略的组中，该策略允许通过使用“用户名”策略变量访问存储桶中的子目录。
column4: 创建一个启用了Reduced Redundancy Storage的53个存储桶，并要求其客户使用53客户端而不是FTP客户端使用Bucket Policy为每个客户创建一个存储桶，该存储策略仅允许访问该客户。
column5: 使用扩展策略创建自动扩展的FTP服务器组，以便在自动扩展组上的最小网络流量低于给定阈值时自动扩展。从53开始加载ftp用户的中央列表，作为每个实例上的用户数据启动脚本的一部分。
column6: 创建一个启用了请求者支付的单个53桶，并要求其客户使用53客户端而不是FTP客户端使用允许仅访问该客户的存储桶策略为每个客户创建存储桶。

column2: 在VPC中创建网络时，NAT设备中的哪一个是正确的？
column3: 您必须管理AWS提供的NAT网关服务。

column5: 您可以使用NAT设备启用私有子网中的实例以连接到Internet。
column6: 建议您通过NAT网关使用AWS NAT实例，因为实例可提供更好的可用性和带宽。
column15: You can use a NAT device to enable instances in a private subnet to connect to the Internet (for example, for software updates) or other AWS services, but prevent the Internet from initiating connections with the instances. AWS offers two kinds of NAT devices ?a NAT gateway or a NAT instance. We recommend NAT gateways, as they provide better availability and bandwidth over NAT instances. The NAT Gateway service is also a managed service that does not require your administration efforts. A NAT instance is launched from a NAT AMI. You can choose to use a NAT instance for special purposes. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/vpc-nat.html

column2: 您需要使用网络接口为虚拟私有云（VPC）网络创建管理网络。以下哪些语句与配置网络接口的最佳实践有关。
column3: 您可以在实例运行或停止时分离辅助（ethN）网络接口。但是，您无法分离主（eth0）接口。
column4: 启动具有多个网络接口的实例会自动在实例的操作系统上配置接口，专用IP地址和路由表。
column5: 您可以将一个子网中的网络接口连接到同一VPC中另一个子网中的实例，但是，网络接口和实例必须位于同一可用区中。
column6: 将另一个网络接口附加到实例是一种有效的方法，可以增加或加倍双归属实例的网络带宽
column15: the instance is running or stopped. However, you can't detach the primary (eth0) interface. You can attach a network interface in one subnet to an instance in another subnet in the same VPC, however, both the network interface and the instance must reside in the same Availability Zone. When launching an instance from the CLI or API, you can specify the network interfaces to attach to the instance for both the primary (eth0) and additional network interfaces. Launching an instance with multiple network interfaces automatically configures interfaces, private IP addresses, and route tables on the operating system of the instance. A warm or hot attach of an additional network interface may require you to manually bring up the second interface, configure the private IP address, and modify the route table accordingly. (Instances running Amazon Linux automatically recognize the warm or hot attach and configure themselves.) Attaching another network interface to an instance is not a method to increase or double the network bandwidth to or from the dual-homed instance. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-eni.html#use-network-and-security- applia nces-in-your-vpc

column15: A network access control list (ACL) is an optional layer of security that acts as a firewall for controlling traffic in and out of a subnet. You might set up network ACLs with rules similar to your security groups in order to add an additional layer of security to your VPC. The following ports are recommended by AWS for a single subnet with instances that can receive and send Internet traffic and a private subnet that can't receive traffic directly from the Internet. However, it can initiate traffic to the Internet (and receive responses) through a NAT instance in the public subnet. Inbound SSH traffic. Port 22 Web servers in the public subnet to read and write to MS SQL servers in the private subnet. Port 1433 Inbound RDP traffic from the Microsoft Terminal Services gateway in the public private subnet. Port 3389 Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/ VPC_Appendix_NACLs.html#VPC_Appendi x_NACLs_Scenario_2

column15: AWS Direct Connect makes it easy to establish a dedicated network connection from your premises to AWS. Using AWS Direct Connect, you can establish private connectivity between AWS and your datacenter, office, or colocation environment, which in many cases can reduce your network costs, increase bandwidth throughput, and provide a more consistent network experience than internet-based connections. You could expect the following benefits if you use AWS Direct Connect. Reduced bandwidth costs Consistent network performance Compatibility with all AWS services Private connectivity to your Amazon VPC Elasticity Simplicity Reference: http://aws.amazon.com/directconnect/

For all other reasons, such as "AMI is missing part", "Corrupt Snapshot" or "Volume limit has reached" it will launch an EC2 instance and then terminate it. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/Using_InstanceStraightToTerminated.html

column15: You can seamlessly join an EC2 instance to your directory domain when the instance is launched using the Amazon EC2 Simple Systems Manager. If you need to manually join an EC2 instance to your domain, you must launch the instance in the proper region and security group or subnet, then join the instance to the domain. To be able to connect remotely to these instances, you must have IP connectivity to the instances from the network you are connecting from. In most cases, this requires that an Internet gateway be attached to your VPC and that the instance has a public IP address. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/directoryservice/latest/admin-guide/join_a_directory.html

column2: George已经使用他的AWS账户在US-East-1a区域内启动了三个EC2实例。 Ray已经使用他的AWS账户在US-East-1a区域启动了两个EC2实例。以下哪些陈述将有助于George和Ray更好地理解可用区（AZ）概念？
column3: George和Ray的所有实例都可以通过私有IP进行通信，而且成本最低

column6: George和Ray的实例将在同一个数据中心运行
column15: Each AWS region has multiple, isolated locations known as Availability Zones. To ensure that the AWS resources are distributed across the Availability Zones for a region, AWS independently maps the Availability Zones to identifiers for each account. In this case the Availability Zone US-East-1a where George's EC2 instances are running might not be the same location as the US-East-1a zone of Ray's EC2 instances. There is no way for the user to coordinate the Availability Zones between accounts. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-regions-availability-zones.html

column5: AWS DNS服务器的全球分布特性有助于确保将最终用户路由到应用程序的一致能力。
column6: Route 53支持域名系统安全扩展（DNSSEC）。
column15: internet or network related issues. Route 53 is designed to provide the level of dependability required by important applications. Using a global anycast network of DNS servers around the world, Route 53 is designed to automatically answer queries from the optimal location depending on network conditions. As a result, the service offers low query latency for your end users. Amazon Route 53 does not support Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) at this time. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/route53/faqs/

column2: 你可以加密EBS卷吗？
column3: 是的，您可以在使用AWS管理控制台，API或CLI创建新的EBS卷时启用加密。

column6: 是的，您可以通过Amazon API使用特殊的“ebs_encrypt”命令进行加密。
column15: With Amazon EBS encryption, you can now create an encrypted EBS volume and attach it to a supported instance type. Data on the volume, disk I/O, and snapshots created from the volume are then all encrypted. The encryption occurs on the servers that host the EC2 instances, providing encryption of data as it moves between EC2 instances and EBS storage. EBS encryption is based on the industry standard AES-256 cryptographic algorithm. To get started, simply enable encryption when you create a new EBS volume using the AWS Management Console, API, or CLI. Amazon EBS encryption is available for all the latest EC2 instances in all commercially available AWS regions. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2014/05/21/Amazon-EBS-encryption-now-available/

column15: Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS) is a highly reliable distributed messaging system for storing messages as they travel between computers. By using Amazon SQS, developers can simply move data between distributed application components. It is used to achieve compartmentalization or loose coupling. In this case all the modules will send a message to the logger queue and the data will be processed by queue as per the resource availability. Reference: http://media.amazonwebservices.com/AWS_Building_Fault_Tolerant_Applications.pdf

column2: 您在AWS S3上存储了一些非常敏感的数据，并希望尝试所有可能的替代方案，以确保其在访问控制方面的安全性。 AWS S3上可用于访问控制的机制是什么？
column3: （IAM）策略，访问控制列表（ACL），存储桶策略和查询字符串身份验证。
column4: （IAM）策略，访问控制列表（ACL）和存储桶策略。
column5: 访问控制列表（ACL），存储桶策略和查询字符串身份验证
column6: （IAM）策略，访问控制列表（ACL），存储桶策略，查询字符串身份验证和加密。
column15: Amazon S3 supports several mechanisms that give you flexibility to control who can access your data as well as how, when, and where they can access it. Amazon S3 provides four different access control mechanisms: AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies, Access Control Lists (ACLs), bucket policies, and query string authentication. IAM enables organizations to create and manage multiple users under a single AWS account. With IAM policies, you can grant IAM users fine-grained control to your Amazon S3 bucket or objects. You can use ACLs to selectively add (grant) certain permissions on individual objects. Amazon S3 bucket policies can be used to add or deny permissions across some or all of the objects within a single bucket. With Query string authentication, you have the ability to share Amazon S3 objects through URLs that are valid for a specified period of time.

Consolidated Billing enables you to see a combined view of AWS costs incurred by all accounts, as well as obtain a detailed cost report for each of the individual AWS accounts associated with your "Paying Account". Consolidated Billing is offered at no additional charge. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/billing/faqs/

You can use Amazon EBS as a primary storage device for data that requires frequent and granular updates. For example, Amazon EBS is the recommended storage option when you run a database on an instance. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/Storage.html

column15: Amazon CloudWatch can monitor AWS resources such as Amazon EC2 instances, Amazon DynamoDB tables, and Amazon RDS DB instances, as well as custom metrics generated by your applications and services, and any log files your applications generate. You can use Amazon CloudWatch to gain system-wide visibility into resource utilization, application performance, and operational health. You can use these insights to react and keep your application running smoothly. Reference: http://aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/

column15: The Elastic Load Balancer connection draining feature causes the load balancer to stop sending new requests to the back-end instances when the instances are deregistering or become unhealthy, while ensuring that in-flight requests continue to be served. The user can specify a maximum time of 3600 seconds (1 hour) for the load balancer to keep the connections alive before reporting the instance as deregistered. If the user does not specify the maximum timeout period, by default, the load balancer will close the connections to the deregistering instance after 300 seconds. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/config-conn-drain.html

column2: 关于在EC2-Classic和EC2-VPC平台中使用弹性IP地址（EIP），以下哪项陈述不正确？
column3: 在EC2-VPC平台中，弹性IP地址（EIP）在停止时不会与实例保持关联。
column4: 在EC2-Classic平台中，停止实例会取消弹性IP地址（EIP）。
column5: 在EC2-VPC平台中，如果已将第二个网络接口连接到实例，则在取消弹性IP地址（EIP）与该实例的关联时，不会自动为该实例分配新的公共IP地址。你必须手动将EIP与它相关联。
column6: 在EC2-Classic平台中，如果取消弹性IP地址（EIP）与实例的关联，则会在几分钟内自动为实例分配新的公共IP地址。
column15: In the EC2-Classic platform, when you associate an Elastic IP Address (EIP) with an instance, the instance's current public IP address is released to the EC2-Classic public IP address pool. If you disassociate an EIP from the instance, the instance is automatically assigned a new public IP address within a few minutes. In addition, stopping the instance also disassociates the EIP from it. But in the EC2-VPC platform, when you associate an EIP with an instance in a default Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), or an instance in which you assigned a public IP to the eth0 network interface during launch, its current public IP address is released to the EC2-VPC public IP address pool. If you disassociate an EIP from the instance, the instance is automatically assigned a new public IP address within a few minutes. However, if you have attached a second network interface to the instance, the instance is not automatically assigned a new public IP address; you'll have to associate an EIP with it manually. The EIP remains associated with the instance when you stop it. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/elastic-ip-addresses-eip.html

Third-party support applies only to software running on Amazon EC2 and does not extend to assisting with on-premises software. An exception to this is a VPN tunnel configuration running supported devices for Amazon VPC. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/features/

column2: 在确定EMR将有助于分析您正在构建的游戏网站的大量数据之后，您刚刚部署了Amazon EMR群集并希望监控群集性能。以下哪些工具不能用于监控群集性能？
column5: CloudWatch指标
column6: Hadoop Web界面
column15: Amazon EMR provides several tools to monitor the performance of your cluster. Hadoop Web Interfaces Every cluster publishes a set of web interfaces on the master node that contain information about the cluster. You can access these web pages by using an SSH tunnel to connect them on the master node. For more information, see View Web Interfaces Hosted on Amazon EMR Clusters. CloudWatch Metrics Every cluster reports metrics to CloudWatch. CloudWatch is a web service that tracks metrics, and which you can use to set alarms on those metrics. For more information, see Monitor Metrics with CloudWatch. Ganglia Ganglia is a cluster monitoring tool. To have this available, you have to install Ganglia on the cluster when you launch it. After you've done so, you can monitor the cluster as it runs by using an SSH tunnel to connect to the Ganglia UI running on the master node. For more information, see Monitor Performance with Ganglia. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticMapReduce/latest/DeveloperGuide/emr-troubleshoot-tools.html

column2: 用户在美国西部地区启动了一个EC2实例。用户想要从该EC2实例访问在美国东部地区启动的RDS实例。用户如何配置该EC2实例的访问权限？
column3: 配置US West区域实例的IP范围作为RDS的入口安全规则
column4: 无法从美国西部地区访问美国东部地区的RDS
column5: 在RDS安全组的入口规则中打开美国西部地区的安全组
column6: 创建一个IAM角色，该角色可以访问RDS并使用它在美国西部地区启动实例
column15: The user cannot authorize an Amazon EC2 security group if it is in a different AWS Region than the RDS DB instance. The user can authorize an IP range or specify an Amazon EC2 security group in the same region that refers to an IP address in another region. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/USER_WorkingWithSecurityGroups.html

column2: 您需要在正在构建的VPC网络中创建负载均衡器。您可以使负载均衡器内部（私有）或面向Internet（公共）。当您在内部创建负载均衡器时，将创建DNS名称，并且它将包含负载均衡器的专用IP地址。内部负载平衡器不会暴露在互联网上。当您使负载均衡器面向Internet时，将使用公共IP地址创建DNS名称。如果您希望面向Internet的负载均衡器连接到Internet，那么此负载均衡器必须驻留在哪里？
column3: 负载均衡器必须位于使用Internet网关连接到Internet的子网中。
column4: 负载均衡器必须位于未连接到Internet的子网中。
column5: 负载均衡器不得驻留在连接到Internet的子网中。
column6: 负载平衡器必须完全位于您的VPC之外。
column15: When you create an internal Elastic Load Balancer in a VPC, you need to select private subnets that are in the same Availability Zone as your instances. If the VPC Elastic Load Balancer is to be public facing, you need to create the Elastic Load Balancer in a public subnet. A subnet is a public subnet if it is attached to an Internet Gateway (IGW) with a defined route to that gateway. Selecting more than one public subnet increases the availability of your Elastic Load Balancer. NB - Elastic Load Balancers in EC2-Classic are always Internet-facing load balancers. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/elb-internet-facing-load- balancers.html

column2: 您可以将预留实例从一个可用区移动到另一个可用区吗？
column3: 是的，但每个预留实例都与无法更改的特定区域相关联。
column5: 是的，仅限美国东部地区1。
column6: 没有
column15: Each Reserved Instance is associated with a specific Region, which is fixed for the lifetime of the reservation and cannot be changed. Each reservation can, however, be used in any of the available AZs within the associated Region. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/rds/faqs/

column2: 在EC2实例上托管的应用程序从ELB接收HTTP请求。同一请求有一个X-Forwarded-For标头，它有三个IP地址。哪个系统的IP将成为此标头的一部分？
column5: 这里列出了所有答案。
column6: 负载均衡器IP地址。
column15: When a user sends a request to ELB over HTTP/HTTPS, the request header log at the instance will only receive the IP of ELB. This is because ELB is the interceptor between the EC2 instance and the client request. To get the client IP, use the header X-Forwarded-For in header. The client IP address in the X-Forwarded-For request header is followed by the IP addresses of each successive proxy that passes along the request. The last IP address is the IP address that connects to the back-end application instance. e.g. if the HTTP request already has a header when it reaches the Load Balancer, the IP address from which the request came is appended at the end of the header followed by the IP address of the Load Balancer. In such cases, the X-Forwarded-For request header takes the following form: X-Forwarded-For: clientIPAddress, previousRequestIPAddress, LoadBalancerIPAddress. Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/ TerminologyandKeyConcepts.html

column2: 您需要在AWS上开发和运行一些新应用程序，并且您知道Elastic Beanstalk和CloudFormation都可以作为各种AWS资源的部署机制提供帮助。以下哪项陈述最能说明Elastic Beanstalk和CloudFormation之间的区别？
column3: Elastic Beanstalk使用Elastic负载平衡而CloudFormation不使用。
column4: CloudFormation在部署应用程序方面比Elastic Beanstalk更快。
column5: Elastic Beanstalk在部署应用程序方面比CloudFormation更快。
column6: CloudFormation比Elastic Beanstalk强大得多，因为您实际上可以设计和编写自定义资源
column15: These services are designed to complement each other. AWS Elastic Beanstalk provides an environment to easily develop and run applications in the cloud. It is integrated with developer tools and provides a one-stop experience for you to manage the lifecycle of your applications. AWS CloudFormation is a convenient deployment mechanism for a broad range of AWS resources. It supports the infrastructure needs of many different types of applications such as existing enterprise applications, legacy applications, applications built using a variety of AWS resources and container-based solutions (including those built using AWS Elastic Beanstalk). AWS CloudFormation introduces two new concepts: The template, a JSON-format, text-based file that describes all the AWS resources you need to deploy to run your application and the stack, the set of AWS resources that are created and managed as a single unit when AWS CloudFormation instantiates a template. Reference: http://aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/faqs/

column2: 您需要为客户的电子商务网站设置安全证书，因为它将使用HTTPS协议。您需要访问以下哪些AWS服务来管理您的SSL服务器证书？

All your SSL server certificates are managed by AWS Identity and Access management (IAM). Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/ManagingServerCerts.html

column2: 您在一家拥有AWS生产环境的建筑公司工作。生产环境包含3个相同的Web服务器，这些服务器使用Auto Scaling从标准Amazon Linux AMI启动。 Web服务器启动到同一公共子网并属于同一安全组。他们也坐在同一个ELB后面。您决定进行一些测试和开发，并将第四个EC2实例启动到同一子网和相同的安全组。令人讨厌的是，您的第4个实例似乎没有互联网连接。可能是什么原因造成的？

column2: 您已在us-west-2中开发了一个新的Web应用程序，该应用程序需要始终运行六个Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud（EC2）实例。您在该区域有三个可用区域（us-west-2a，us-west-2b和us-west-2c）。如果us-west-2中的任何单一可用区变得不可用，则需要100％的容错能力。你会怎么做，每个答案有2个答案，选择答案同时正确答案。
column3: 答案1  -  Us-west-2a有两个EC2实例，us-west-2b有两个EC2实例，us-west-2c有两个EC2实例。答案2  -  Us-west-2a有六个EC2实例，us-west-2b有六个EC2实例，us- west-2c没有EC2实例
column4: 答案1  -  Us-west-2a有六个EC2实例，us-west-2b有六个EC2实例，us-west-2c没有EC2实例。答案2  -  Us-west-2a有三个EC2实例，us-west-2b有三个EC2实例，us-west-2c有三个EC2实例。
column5: 答案1  -  Us-west-2a有三个EC2实例，us-west-2b有三个EC2实例，us-west-2c没有EC2实例。答案2  -  Us-west-2a有三个EC2实例，us-west-2b有三个EC2实例，us-west-2c有三个EC2实例。
column6: 答案1  -  Us-west-2a有三个EC2实例，us-west-2b有三个EC2实例，us-west-2c有三个EC2实例。答案2  -  Us-west-2a有四个EC2实例，us-west-2b有两个EC2实例，us-west-2c有两个EC2实例。

column2: 您在欧洲的主要新闻网络工作。他们刚刚发布了一款新应用，允许用户使用手机报告事件发生的时间。用户可以从应用程序上传图片，然后其他用户将能够查看这些图片。您的组织希望此应用程序能够快速增长，基本上每月将其用户群增加一倍。该应用程序使用S3来存储媒体，并且当发生重大新闻事件时（由于人们将大量上传内容），您预计S3的流量会突然大幅增加。您需要将存储成本降至最低，但是如果某些对象丢失则无关紧要。您应该使用哪种存储介质来降低成本？
column3: S3  - 不经常访问的存储。
column5: 冰川。
column6: S3  - 预配置IOPS。

column2: 您为一家正在部署混合云方法的着名面包店工作。他们的旧IBM AS400服务器将保留在他们自己的数据中心内部，但是他们需要能够通过站点到站点VPN连接与AWS环境进行通信。您需要做什么才能建立VPN连接？

column2: 贵公司已决定为测试和开发目的设置新的AWS账户。他们已经使用AWS进行生产，但是想要一个专门用于测试和开发的新帐户，以免意外破坏生产环境。您可以使用公司在生产中使用的CloudFormation模板启动生产环境的精确副本。但是CloudFormation失败了。您在生产中使用完全相同的CloudFormation模板，因此失败与您的新AWS账户有关。 CloudFormation模板尝试在单个AZ中启动60个新的EC2实例。经过一些研究，你发现问题是;
column3: 对于所有新AWS账户，每个区域的软限制为20 EC2个实例。您应该提交限制增加表单，并在限制增加后重试模板。
column4: 对于所有新AWS账户，每个可用区域的软限制为20 EC2实例。您应该提交限制增加表单，并在限制增加后重试模板。
column5: 您无法在默认VPC中启动超过20个实例，而是重新配置CloudFormation模板以在自定义VPC中配置实例。
column6: 您的CloudFormation模板配置为使用父帐户而不是新帐户。更改CloudFormation模板中的帐号并重新启动模板。

column5: Cloudwatch，RDS和DynamoDb
column6: RDS，DynamoDB和Elasticache。

column2: 您经营一家汽车转售公司，该公司在AWS上拥有一个受欢迎的在线商店。该应用程序位于Auto Scaling组后面，需要Auto Scaling组的新实例来标识其公共和私有IP地址。你怎么能实现这个目标？

column2: 您是一家为生物技术公司工作的解决方案架构师，该公司是免疫疗法研究的先驱。他们开发了一种新的癌症治疗方法，可以治愈多达94％的癌症。他们将研究数据存储在S3上，但最近实习生意外删除了一些关键文件。你被要求阻止将来发生这种情况。以下哪些选项可以防止此问题？
column3: 确保实习生只能使用签名URL访问S3上的数据。
column4: 在存储桶上启用S3版本控制并启用存储桶上的启用多因素身份验证（MFA）。
column5: 使用S3不常访问存储来存储数据。
column6: 创建禁用删除的IAM存储桶策略。

column2: 您是一家为大型防病毒公司工作的安全架构师。生产环境最近已移至AWS并位于公有子网中。您可以通过HTTP查看生产环境，但是当客户尝试通过自定义端口更新其病毒定义文件时，该端口将被阻止。您登录到控制台，并允许通过自定义端口的流量。这需要多长时间才能生效？
column5: 几分钟后，这应该生效。
column6: 直接到新实例，但必须在新规则应用之前停止并重新启动旧实例。

column2: 您被要求在AWS上标识一个持久密钥值存储的服务。以下哪项服务符合此定义？
column5: 简单存储服务（S3）
column6: 弹性文件服务（EFS）

column2: 根据定义，VPC内的公共子网是一个;
column3: 在它的路由表中，它至少有一条使用Internet网关（IGW）的路由。
column4: 在其路由表中至少有一个路由通过网络地址转换（NAT）实例进行路由。
column5: 网络访问控制列表（NACL）允许出站流量为0.0.0.0/0的位置。
column6: 在VPC控制台中设置此子网时，已勾选公共子网复选框。

column2: 您在基因组学行业工作，并使用夜间弹性地图减少（EMR）工作处理大量基因组数据。此作业处理存储在S3上的单个3 Tb文件。 EMR作业在3个按需核心节点和4个按需任务节点上运行。 EMR工作现在花费的时间超过预期，并且您被要求建议如何缩短完成时间？
column3: 对任务节点使用四个竞价型实例，而不是四个按需实例。
column4: 您应该减少MapReduce作业配置中的输入分割大小，然后调整同时映射器任务的数量，以便可以一次处理更多任务。
column5: 将文件存储在Elastic File Service而不是S3上，然后将EFS作为核心节点的独立卷安装。
column6: 配置一个独立的VPC，在其中运行EMR作业，然后将EFS作为核心节点的独立卷安装。
column7: 为作业流启用终止保护。

column2: 你在一家拥有繁忙网上商店的玩具公司工作。当你接近圣诞节时，你会发现你的商店的流量越来越大。您确保商店的Web层位于Auto Scaling组后面，但是您注意到Web层经常进行扩展，有时会在一小时内多次缩放，但只能在高峰使用后缩减。您需要阻止这种情况，以便Auto Scaling不会快速缩放，只需再缩放。什么选项可以帮助您实现这一目标？
column3: 配置Auto Scaling以首先终止最旧的实例，然后调整CloudWatch警报。
column4: 配置Auto Scaling以首先终止最新实例，然后调整CloudWatch警报。
column5: 更改Auto Scaling，使其仅在预定时间进行缩放。
column6: 修改Auto Scaling组冷却计时器并修改触发Auto Scaling缩减策略的Amazon CloudWatch警报周期。

column2: 您是目前正在学习不同AWS服务的学生。您的雇主要求您告诉他一些有关亚马逊冰川服务的信息。以下哪项最能描述Glacier的用例？
column3: 不经常访问的数据和数据存档

column2: 您是系统管理员，您需要监视生产环境的运行状况。您决定使用Cloud Watch执行此操作，但是您注意到您无法在默认仪表板中看到每个重要指标的运行状况。在监控EC2实例的运行状况时，您需要为以下哪些指标设计自定义云监视指标？
column5: 磁盘读取操作
column6: 网络
column7: 估计费用

column2: 您在媒体行业工作，并创建了一个Web应用程序，用户可以将他们创建的照片上传到您的网站。此Web应用程序必须能够调用S3 API才能运行。您应该在何处存储API凭据，同时保持最高级别的安全性。
column3: 将API凭据保存到您的php文件。
column4: 不要保存您的API凭据。而是在IAM中创建角色，并在首次创建时将此角色分配给EC2实例。
column5: 将您的API凭据保存在公共Github存储库中。
column6: 使用实例userdata将API凭据传递给实例。

column2: 您在一家化妆品公司工作，该公司在AWS上拥有自己的生产网站。站点本身采用双层配置，前端是Web服务器，后端是数据库服务器。该站点使用Elastic Load Balancing和Auto Scaling。数据库通过在发生更改时相互复制更改来保持一致性。这要求数据库具有极低的延迟。您的网站需要高度冗余，并且必须进行设计，以便在一个可用区域脱机且Auto Scaling无法在剩余可用区域中启动新实例时，该站点将不会脱机。如何增强当前架构以确保这一点？
column3: 在同一地区的三个不同的AZ中部署您的网站。配置Auto Scaling最小值以处理每个区域50％的峰值负载。
column4: 在2个不同的地区部署您的网站。使用故障转移路由策略配置Route53并在主站点上设置运行状况检查。
column5: 在同一地区的三个不同的AZ中部署您的网站。配置Auto Scaling最小值以处理每个区域33％的峰值负载。
column6: 在2个不同的地区部署您的网站。使用加权路由配置Route53。将区域1的重量为25％，区域2的重量为75％。

column2: 您被要求为您的公司创建VPC。 VPC必须支持面向Internet的Web应用程序（即它们需要公开访问）和内部私有应用程序（即它们不可公开访问，并且只能通过VPN访问）。内部私有应用程序必须位于私有子网内。面向Internet和私有应用程序都必须能够利用至少三个可用区来实现高可用性。至少，您必须在VPC中创建多少个子网才能实现这一目标？
您正在EC2实例的根卷上托管MySQL数据库。数据库使用大量IOP，您需要增加可用的IOP。你该怎么办？
column3: 将数据库迁移到S3存储桶。
column5: 添加4个额外的EBS SSD卷，并使用这些卷创建RAID 10。
column6: 使用Cloud Front缓存数据库。

column2: 您已将文件上传到S3。什么HTTP代码表明上传成功了？
column5: HTTP 200
column6: HTTP 307

column2: 您运营一个托管视频的网站，您有两种类型的会员，付费付费会员和免费会员。您的高级会员和免费会员上传的所有视频均由一组EC2实例处理，这些实例将在视频上传时轮询SQS。但是，您需要确保您的付费付费会员视频的优先级高于您的免费会员。你如何设计SQS？
column3: SQS允许您为队列中的各个项目设置优先级，因此只需将付费会员设置为比您的免费会员更高的优先级。
column4: 创建两个SQS队列，一个用于高级成员，一个用于免费成员。对您的EC2机队进行编程以首先轮询高级队列，如果为空，则轮询您的免费成员SQS队列。
column5: SQS不适合这种情况。使用SNS对视频进行编码会好得多。

column2: 亚马逊的Redshift使用哪种块大小的列式存储？
column5: 16KB
column6: 32KB
column7: 1024KB / 1MB

column2: 创建RDS实例时，您可以选择部署实例的可用区域。

column15: It is important in this question to note that the instance is in a VPC to rule out other answers. Any instance storage device is only persisted during the running life of the instance because instance storage is physically attached to the host rather than SAN storage like EBS. Now part of the reason that instance storage only persists while an instance is powered on is because the host could/always changes when the instance is started. Remember that instance resources are very loosely coupled with other resources. When you start an instance, it gets a resource reservation on a carefully chosen, presumably with some complex algorithm, available host.

(For user-based policies, the principal is the IAM user that the policy is attached to, or the user who gets the policy from a group.) http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/access_policies.html

column2: Amazon S3提供了许多安全功能，用于保护静态数据，您可以使用与否，具体取决于您的威胁配置文件。 S3的哪些功能允许您创建和管理自己的加密密钥以发送数据？
column5: 数据完整性妥协
column6: 服务器端加密
column15: With client-side encryption you create and manage your own encryption keys. Keys you create are not exported to AWS in clear text. Your applications encrypt data before submitting it to Amazon S3, and decrypt data after receiving it from Amazon S3. Data is stored in an encrypted form, with keys and algorithms only known to you. While you can use any encryption algorithm, and either symmetric or asymmetric keys to encrypt the data, the AWS-provided Java SDK offers Amazon S3 client-side encryption features. https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/aws-security-best-practices.pdf

column15: You can protect data at rest in Amazon S3 by using three different modes of server-side encryption: SSE-S3, SSE-C, or SSE-KMS. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/services-s3.html

column15: A Hardware Security Module (HSM) is a hardware appliance that provides secure key storage and cryptographic operations within a tamper-resistant hardware device. They are designed to securely store cryptographic key material and also to be able to use this key material without exposing it outside the cryptographic boundary of the appliance. https://aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/faqs/

To do this, you first write an AWS IAM policy, which is a document that explicitly lists the permissions you want to grant. You then attach that policy to an AWS IAM user or role. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/UsingIAMWithDDB.html

column15: AWS EBS supports encryption of the volume. It also supports creating volumes from existing snapshots provided the snapshots are created from encrypted volumes. The data at rest, the I/O as well as all the snapshots of the encrypted EBS will also be encrypted. EBS encryption is based on the AES-256 cryptographic algorithm, which is the industry standard. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/EBSEncryption.html

column15: encryption keys (SSE-S3) employs strong multi-factor encryption. Amazon S3 encrypts each object with a unique key. As an additional safeguard, it encrypts the key itself with a master key that it regularly rotates. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/UsingServerSideEncryption.html

column15: Amazon VPC provides two features that you can use to increase security for your VPC: Security groups--Act as a firewall for associated Amazon EC2 instances, controlling both inbound and outbound traffic at the instance level and supports allow rules only. Network access control lists (ACLs)--Act as a firewall for associated subnets, controlling both inbound and outbound traffic at the subnet level and supports allow rules and deny rules. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_Security.html

For example, you can use IAM to determine who is allowed to create, describe, modify, and delete DB instances, tag resources, or modify DB security groups. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/UsingWithRDS.html

column2: 您被要求设计分层安全解决方案，以保护您组织的网络基础架构。您研究了几个选项并决定部署网络级安全控制设备（内联），在转发到最终目标（例如应用程序服务器）之前拦截和分析流量。以下哪项不被视为内联威胁防护技术？

column15: Many organizations consider layered security to be a best practice for protecting network infrastructure. In the cloud, you can use a combination of Amazon VPC, implicit firewall rules at the hypervisor-layer, alongside network access control lists, security groups, host-based firewalls, and IDS/IPS systems to create a layered solution for network security. While security groups, NACLs and host-based firewalls meet the needs of many customers, if you're looking for defense in-depth, you should deploy a network-level security control appliance, and you should do so inline, where traffic is intercepted and analyzed prior to being forwarded to its final destination, such as an application server. Examples of inline threat protection technologies include the following: . Third-party firewall devices installed on Amazon EC2 instances (also known as soft blades) . Unified threat management (UTM) gateways . Intrusion prevention systems . Data loss management gateways . Anomaly detection gateways . Advanced persistent threat detection gateways https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/aws-security-best-practices.pdf

column2: 您需要确定使用AWS KMS中的哪个密钥加密或解密AWS CodeCommit存储库中的数据所执行的加密操作。以下哪项操作最能帮助您实现这一目标？

column15: The encryption context is additional authenticated information AWS KMS uses to check for data integrity. When specified for the encryption operation, it must also be specified in the decryption operation or decryption will fail. AWS CodeCommit uses the AWS CodeCommit repository ID for the encryption context. You can find the repository ID by using the get-repository command or by viewing repository details in the AWS CodeCommit console. Search for the AWS CodeCommit repository ID in AWS CloudTrail logs to understand which encryption operations were taken on which key in AWS KMS to encrypt or decrypt data in the AWS CodeCommit repository. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/codecommit/latest/userguide/encryption.html

column2: AWS Key Management Service（AWS KMS）是一项托管服务，可让您轻松创建和控制用于加密数据的加密密钥。 AWS KMS与其他AWS服务集成，包括Amazon EBS，Amazon S3，Amazon Redshift，Elastic Transcoder，Amazon WorkMail和Amazon RDS，以便使用您管理的加密密钥轻松加密数据。 AWS KMS还与AWS CloudTrail集成，为您提供关键使用日志，以帮助您满足法规和合规性需求。 AWS KMS目前支持以下哪种类型的加密密钥？
column3: 私人短暂密钥协议密码学
column4: 对称和非对称随机数生成密钥密码术
column5: 非对称密钥密码术和对称密钥密码术
column6: 只有对称密钥加密
column15: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) is a managed service that makes it easy for you to create and control the encryption keys used to encrypt your data. AWS KMS is integrated with other AWS services including Amazon EBS, Amazon S3, Amazon Redshift, Elastic Transcoder, Amazon WorkMail, and Amazon RDS to make it simple to encrypt your data with encryption keys that you manage. AWS KMS is also integrated with AWS CloudTrail to provide you with key usage logs to help meet your regulatory and compliance needs. AWS KMS currently supports only symmetric (private) key cryptography. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/crypto-intro.html

column2: 您的客户担心其敏感数据的安全性，他们的询问会询问AWS上旧存储设备的情况。这个问题的最佳答案是什么？
column3: AWS使用第三方安全组织来销毁数据，作为退役过程的一部分。
column4: AWS使用DoD 5220.22-M中详述的技术来销毁数据，作为退役过程的一部分。
column5: AWS重新格式化磁盘并再次使用它们。
column6: 作为退役过程的一部分，AWS使用自己的专有软件来销毁数据。
column15: When a storage device has reached the end of its useful life, AWS procedures include a decommissioning process that is designed to prevent customer data from being exposed to unauthorized individuals. AWS uses the techniques detailed in DoD 5220.22-M ("National Industrial Security Program Operating Manual ") or NIST 800-88 ("Guidelines for Media Sanitization") to destroy data as part of the decommissioning process. All decommissioned magnetic storage devices are degaussed and physically destroyed in accordance with industry-standard practices. https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/aws-security-whitepaper.pdf

column2: 在AWS身份和访问管理（IAM）中，您可以使用______ API为用户授予对资源的临时访问权限。

column15: AWS Security Token Service enables the creation of temporary credentials that can be used along with IAM in order to grant access to trusted entities and users to your AWS resources for a predefined amount of time. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp.html

column2: 作为两个单独组的一部分，IAM用户有两个冲突的策略。一个策略允许他访问S3存储桶，而另一个策略拒绝他访问。用户可以访问该存储桶吗？
column5: 是的，只要他访问具有S3访问权限的组
column6: 是的，但只读取桶的访问权限
column15: When a request is made, the AWS IAM policy decides whether a given request should be allowed or denied. The evaluation logic follows these rules: By default, all requests are denied. (In general, requests made using the account credentials for resources in the account are always allowed.) An explicit allow policy overrides this default. An explicit deny policy overrides any allows. In this case since there is an explicit deny policy, it will over ride everything and the request will be denied. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/AccessPolicyLanguage_EvaluationLogic.html

column2: 一个组织已经启动了5个实例：2个用于生产，3个用于测试。组织希望特定的IAM用户组仅访问测试实例而不访问生产测试实例。他们希望根据不时变化的因素在不同位置部署实例，尤其是在测试组中。他们希望实例经常需要被搅动，即删除和替换，特别是在测试组中。这意味着他们现在创建的五个实例很快将被另一组五个实例替换。每个组的成员，生产和测试，在可预见的未来不会改变。鉴于这种情况，下面的选择是定义IAM策略的最有效和最省时的策略？
column3: 通过创建具有允许仅访问小实例的条件的IAM策略
column4: 通过定义允许基于实例ID进行访问的IAM策略
column5: 通过在不同区域启动测试和生产实例，并允许以区域方式访问组
column6: 通过在测试和生产团队成员IAM用户ID上定义标记，并向允许访问特定标记的IAM策略添加条件
column15: AWS Identity and Access Management is a web service that allows organizations to manage users and user permissions for various AWS services. The user can add conditions as a part of the IAM policies. The condition can be set on AWS Tags, Time, and Client IP as well as on various parameters. If the organization wants the user to access only specific instances, he should define proper tags and add to the IAM policy condition. The sample policy is shown below. "Statement": [ { "Action": "ec2:*", "Effect": "Allow", "Resource": "*", "Condition": { "StringEquals": { "ec2:ResourceTag/InstanceType": "Production" } } } ] http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/ExampleIAMPolicies.html

column2: 对于IAM用户，虚拟多重身份验证（MFA）设备使用生成______位身份验证代码的应用程序，该代码与基于时间的一次性密码（TOTP）标准兼容。
column5: 六
column6: 五
column15: A virtual MFA device uses an application that generates six-digit authentication codes that are compatible with the time-based one-time password (TOTP) standard. Therefore, any application that you wish to use in order to make your smart phone your virtual MFA device needs to conform with the standard. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_mfa_enable_virtual.html

column15: A user can attach more than one security group to a single EC2 instance. In this case, the rules from each security group are effectively aggregated to create one set of rules. AWS uses this set of rules to determine whether to allow access or not. Thus, here the rule for port 22 with IP 10.10.10.1/32 will merge with IP 0.0.0.0/0 and open ports 22 and 80 for all. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-network-security.html

column2: 是否可以使用CloudFormation模板中的策略创建仅由特定IAM用户访问的S3存储桶？

column5: 不，您只能创建S3存储桶而不能创建IAM用户。

column15: With AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), you can create IAM users to control who has access to which resources in your AWS account. You can use IAM with AWS CloudFormation to control what AWS CloudFormation actions users can perform, such as view stack templates, create stacks, or delete stacks. In addition to AWS CloudFormation actions, you can manage what AWS services and resources are available to each user. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/using-iam-template.html

column15: In Amazon CloudFront, if you chose On for Logging, the logs store in the Amazon S3 bucket that you want CloudFront to store access logs in. For example: myawslogbucket.s3.amazonaws.com If you enable logging, CloudFront records information about each end-user request for an object and stores the files in the specified Amazon S3 bucket. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/distribution-web-values- specify.html#DownloadDistValuesLoggingOnOff

This is available for all the versions of Microsoft SQL Server. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Concepts.DBEngine.SQLServer.html

column2: 用户已创建将在EC2上托管的应用程序。该应用程序对DynamoDB进行API调用以获取某些数据。在此实例上运行的应用程序正在使用SDK对DynamoDB进行这些调用。在这种情况下，关于安全性的最佳实践，以下哪些陈述是正确的？
column3: 用户应创建具有访问DynamoDB权限的IAM用户，并在应用程序中使用其凭据连接到DynamoDB
column4: 用户应创建具有DynamoDB和EC2权限的IAM用户。将用户附加到应用程序，以便它不使用root帐户凭据

column15: With AWS IAM a user is creating an application which runs on an EC2 instance and makes requests to AWS, such as DynamoDB or S3 calls. Here it is recommended that the user should not create an IAM user and pass the user's credentials to the application or embed those credentials inside the application. Instead, the user should use roles for EC2 and give that role access to DynamoDB /S3. When the roles are attached to EC2, it will give temporary security credentials to the application hosted on that EC2, to connect with DynamoDB / S3. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_WorkingWithGroupsAndUsers.html

column2: 用户正在尝试使用AWS控制台创建IAM用户列表。创建IAM用户时，默认情况下会为用户启用下面提到的哪些凭据？

column5: IAM密码
column6: IAM访问密钥和秘密访问密钥
column15: Newly created IAM users have no password and no access key (access key ID and secret access key). If the user needs to administer your AWS resources using the AWS Management Console, you can create a password for the user. If the user needs to interact with AWS programmatically (using the command line interface (CLI), the AWS SDK, or service-specific APIs), you can create an access key for that user. The credentials you create for users are what they use to uniquely identify themselves to AWS. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_WorkingWithGroupsAndUsers.html

column2: 您正在AWS CLI上为VPC网络中的传入流量和传出流量设置安全组。您将使用以下哪个AWS CLI命令将一个或多个传入流量规则添加到安全组？

column15: When setting up security groups for incoming traffic in your VPC network, to add one or more ingress(incoming traffic) rules to a security group . authorize-security-group-ingress (AWS CLI) . ec2-authorize (Amazon EC2 CLI) . Grant-EC2SecurityGroupIngress (AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell) In computer networking, ingress filtering is a technique used to make sure that incoming packets are actually from the networks that they claim to be from. In computer networking, egress filtering is the practice of monitoring and potentially restricting the flow of information outbound from one network to another. Typically it is information from a private TCP/IP computer network to the Internet that is controlled. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-network-security.html

column2: IAM实体“AWS账户”类似于：

column15: In IAM the AWS Account is the role with most important permissions. It's equivalent to the root account in a UNIX environment. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/IAMBestPractices.html

column2: AWS KMS（密钥管理服务）使用对称密钥加密来执行加密和解密。对称密钥加密使用相同的算法和密钥来加密和解密数字数据。未加密的数据通常称为明文，无论是否为文本，加密数据通常称为_____。
column5: encryptext
column6: cryptext
column15: Encryption and Decryption AWS KMS uses symmetric key cryptography to perform encryption and decryption. Symmetric key cryptography uses the same algorithm and key to both encrypt and decrypt digital data. The unencrypted data is typically called plaintext whether it is text or not. The encrypted data is typically called ciphertext. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/crypto_overview.html

column2: Bob是可以访问EC2服务的IAM用户。 Admin是一个IAM用户，可以访问包括IAM在内的所有AWS服务。 Bob可以更改自己的密码吗？
column3: 不，IAM用户永远不能更改密码
column5: 是的，仅来自AWS控制台
column6: 是的，前提是管理员已授权Bob更改自己的密码
column15: The IAM users by default cannot change their password. The root owner or IAM administrator needs to set the policy in the password policy page, which should allow the user to change their password. Once it is enabled, the IAM user can always change their own passwords from the AWS console or CLI. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_ManagingUserPwdSelf.html

column2: Lead2pass有三个AWS账户。他们在每个帐户中创建了单独的IAM用户。 Lead2pass需要单个IAM登录URL，例如https://examkiller.signin.aws.amazon.com/console/，以供IAM用户在所有三个帐户中使用。怎么能实现这一目标？

column15: Users can create an alias for they accounts, but the alias should be unique to the account. For example the alias "examkiller" can be assigned to only one account. If a user wants the URL of the AWS IAM sign-in page to have a company name instead of the AWS account ID, he can create an alias for his AWS account ID. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/AccountAlias.html

column2: AWS Direct Connect的以下哪些身份和访问管理（IAM）策略密钥用于日期/时间条件？

column15: AWS Direct Connect implements the following policy keys of Identity and Access Management: aws:CurrentTime (for date/time conditions) aws:EpochTime (the date in epoch or UNIX time, for use with date/time conditions) aws:SecureTransport (Boolean representing whether the request was sent using SSL) aws:SourceIp (the requester's IP address, for use with IP address conditions) aws:UserAgent (information about the requester's client application, for use with string conditions) http://docs.aws.amazon.com/directconnect/latest/UserGuide/using_iam.html

column2: 在适用于RDS的AWS安全最佳实践的上下文中，如果您出于合规性或其他目的需要对静态数据进行加密或数据完整性身份验证，则可以使用SQL加密功能在_____添加保护。

column15: Amazon RDS leverages the same secure infrastructure as Amazon EC2. You can use the Amazon RDS service without additional protection, but if you require encryption or data integrity authentication of data at rest for compliance or other purposes, you can add protection at the application layer, or at the platform layer using SQL cryptographic functions. https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/aws-security-best-practices.pdf

column15: Generally with IAM users, the password can be modified in two ways. The first option is to define the IAM level policy which allows each user to modify their own passwords. The other option is to create a group and create a policy for the group which can change the passwords of various IAM users. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/HowToPwdIAMUser.html

column2: 亚马逊IAM提供什么？

column15: Amazon IAM provides a mechanism to authenticate users when accessing Amazon Web Services. AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) is a web service that helps you securely control access to AWS resources for your users. You use IAM to control who can use your AWS resources (authentication) and what resources they can use and in what ways (authorization). http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_WorkingWithGroupsAndUsers.html

You can use groups to specify permissions for a collection of users, which can make those permissions easier to manage for those users. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_WorkingWithGroupsAndUsers.html

One such rule is that you can specify allow rules, but not deny rules. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_SecurityGroups.html

column2: Lead2pass（使用AWS账户ID 111122223333）为其组织的员工创建了50个IAM用户。这些员工的AWS控制台URL是什么？

column15: When an organization is using AWS IAM for creating various users and manage their access rights, the IAM user can not use the login URL http://aws.amazon.com/console to access AWS management console. The console login URL for the IAM user will have AWS account ID of that organization to identify the IAM user belongs to particular account. The AWS console login URL for the IAM user will be https:// <AWS_Account_ID>.signin.aws.amazon.com/console/. In this case it will be https://111122223333.signin.aws.amazon.com/console/ http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/ AccountAlias.html

column2: 可以通过两种方式分配AWS IAM权限：
column3: 作为基于角色或基于资源。
column5: 基于安全组或基于密钥。
column6: 作为基于用户或基于密钥。
column15: Permissions can be assigned in two ways: as identity-based or as resource-based. . Identity-based, or IAM permissions are attached to an IAM user, group, or role and let you specify what that user, group, or role can do. For example, you can assign permissions to the IAM user named Bob, stating that he has permission to use the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) RunInstances action and that he has permission to get items from an Amazon DynamoDB table named MyCompany. The user Bob might also be granted access to manage his own IAM security credentials. Identity-based permissions can be managed or inline. . Resource-based permissions are attached to a resource. You can specify resource-based permissions for Amazon S3 buckets, Amazon Glacier vaults, Amazon SNS topics, Amazon SQS queues, and AWS Key Management Service encryption keys. Resource-based permissions let you specify who has access to the resource and what actions they can perform on it. Resource-based policies are inline only, not managed. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/ latest/UserGuide/access_permissions.html

column2: 您是否可以更改与VPC内运行的EC2实例的主网络接口（eth0）关联的安全组？

Changing an instance's security groups changes the security groups associated with the primary network interface (eth0) http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-network-security.html#vpc-security-groups

The elements that a policy can contain are as follows: Version, Id, Statement, Sid, Effect, Principal, NotPrincipal, Action, NonAction, Resource, NotResource, Condition, and Supported Data Types. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/reference_policies_elements.html

column2: 在IAM中，您是否可以将多个内联策略附加到特定实体（如用户，角色或组）？

column15: In AWS IAM, you can add as many inline policies as you want to a user, role, or group, but the total aggregate policy size (the sum size of all inline policies) per entity cannot exceed the following limits: User policy size cannot exceed 2,048 characters. Role policy size cannot exceed 10,240 characters. Group policy size cannot exceed 5,120 characters. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/LimitationsOnEntities.html

column2: 客户询问他的所有数据是否在AWS上是安全的，并且特别关注弹性地图缩减（EMR）。您需要告知他AWS的一些安全功能。关于EMR或S3，以下哪些陈述不正确？
column3: AWS网络中发送的每个数据包都使用Internet协议安全性（IPsec）。
column4: Amazon S3提供身份验证机制，以确保存储的数据免受未经授权的访问。
column5: 客户可以在将输入数据上传到Amazon S3之前加密输入数据。
column6: Amazon EMR客户可以选择使用HTTPS协议将数据发送到Amazon S3以进行安全传输。
column15: Amazon S3 provides authentication mechanisms to ensure that stored data is secured against unauthorized access. Unless the customer who is uploading the data specifies otherwise, only that customer can access the data. Amazon EMR customers can also choose to send data to Amazon S3 using the HTTPS protocol for secure transmission. In addition, Amazon EMR always uses HTTPS to send data between Amazon S3 and Amazon EC2. For added security, customers may encrypt the input data before they upload it to Amazon S3 (using any common data compression tool); they then need to add a decryption step to the beginning of their cluster when Amazon EMR fetches the data from Amazon S3. IPsec is a protocol suite for securing Internet Protocol (IP) communications by authenticating and encrypting each IP packet of a data stream. Amazon supports Internet Protocol security (IPsec) VPN connections, but does not protect all data packets at this level. https://aws.amazon.com/elasticmapreduce/faqs/

column2: 如果IAM策略具有多个条件，或者条件具有多个键，则将使用逻辑______操作计算其布尔结果。
column5: 和
column6: 都不是
column15: If there are multiple condition operators, or if there are multiple keys attached to a single condition operator, the conditions are evaluated using a logical AND. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/AccessPolicyLanguage_ElementDescriptions.html

column2: 您已为用户设置IAM策略以访问Elastic Load Balancers，并且您知道IAM策略是由一个或多个语句组成的JSON文档。以下哪些元素不属于IAM政策文件中的声明的一部分？
column5: 影响
column6: 键
column15: When you attach a policy to a user or group of users to control access to your load balancer, it allows or denies the users permission to perform the specified tasks on the specified resources. An IAM policy is a JSON document that consists of one or more statements. Each statement is structured as follows: Effect: The effect can be Allow or Deny. By default, IAM users don't have permission to use resources and API actions, so all requests are denied. An explicit allow overrides the default. An explicit deny overrides any allows. Action: The action is the specific API action for which you are granting or denying permission. Resource: The resource that's affected by the action. With many Elastic Load Balancing API actions, you can restrict the permissions granted or denied to a specific load balancer by specifying its Amazon Resource Name (ARN) in this statement. Otherwise, you can use the * wildcard to specify all of your load balancers. Condition: You can optionally use conditions to control when your policy is in effect. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/UsingIAM.html

column2: 在AWS Identity and Access Management中，角色可由外部用户使用，该外部用户由与_____兼容的外部身份提供商（IdP）服务进行身份验证。
column5: SAML 2.0（安全断言标记语言2.0）
column6: BPML（业务流程建模语言）
column15: In AWS Identity and Access Management, roles can be used by an external user authenticated by an external identity provider (IdP) service that is compatible with SAML 2.0 (Security Assertion Markup Language 2.0). http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_roles_terms-and-concepts.html

column2: 下面提到的哪个选项不是安全管理AWS访问凭证的最佳做法？
column3: 保持定期轮换安全访问凭据
column5: 创建强访问密钥和秘密访问密钥并附加到root帐户
column6: 为特权用户启用MFA
column15: It is a recommended approach to avoid using the access and secret access keys of the root account. Thus, do not download or delete it. Instead make the IAM user as powerful as the root account and use its credentials. The user cannot generate their own access and secret access keys as they are always generated by AWS. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/IAMBestPractices.html

column2: 用户正在创建多个IAM用户，并希望将它们放在IAM组中。应该给他什么建议以加强安全性？
column3: 仅向IAM组授予相关权限，并将IAM用户分配给这些组。
column5: 为用户授予较少的权限，但为该组授予更高的权限
column6: 为用户授予更多权限，但为该组授予最少权限
column15: Instead of defining permissions for individual IAM users, it's usually more convenient to create groups that relate to job functions (administrators, developers, accounting, etc.). Next, define the relevant permissions for each group. Finally, assign IAM users to those groups. All the users in an IAM group inherit the permissions assigned to the group. That way, you can make changes for everyone in a group in just one place. As people move around in your company, you can simply change what IAM group their IAM user belongs to. http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/IAMBestPractices.html

column2: Amazon CloudFront是否适用于交付经常访问的静态对象？
column3: 是的，确实如此，与从Amazon S3中心位置提供服务相比，您的对象可以更快地提供服务。
column4: 不，它不会因为未经常访问的静态对象保留在Amazon CloudFront边缘位置的缓存中。
column5: 不，从Amazon S3（而不是从Amazon CloudFront）交付可能是更受欢迎的对象的更好选择。
column6: 是的，它确实如此，但是您的对象将比从Amazon S3中心位置之一提供的服务更慢。
column15: Amazon CloudFront works well for delivery of static objects that are frequently accessed ?"popular" objects. With Amazon CloudFront, copies of your popular objects are cached in a network of edge locations around the world. Because these edge locations are close to your viewers, your objects can be served more quickly than if they were served from one of Amazon S3's central locations. http://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/details/

column2: 用户正在计划使用EC2进行高度可用的应用程序部署。以下哪个选项无法帮助实现HA？
column5: 使用弹性IP地址
column6: 使用负载平衡
column15: In Amazon Web Service, the user can achieve HA by deploying instances in multiple zones. The elastic IP helps the user achieve HA when one of the instances is down by still keeps the same URL. Load balancing helps with distribution of traffic across multiple availability zones. An AMI helps launch the instance, but aside from how the AMI is configured to best suite high availability, it does not affect the availability of the instance once it is launched. https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/aws-web-hosting-best-practices.pdf

column2: 用户已将CloudWatch警报配置为在CPU利用率指标超过50％且连续10个时间段的时间间隔为5分钟时触发。如果CPU利用率恒定在20％，那么在30分钟结束时警报的状态是什么？

column2: 在Amazon CloudFront中使用网络时，以下哪项是正确的？
